short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Localize Editor extension provides enhanced campatability when using the Localize In-Context Editor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Localize Editor extension provides enhanced compatibility when using the Localize In-Context Editor. It strips headers (such as CSP, x-frame-options, and others) and augments request cookies to ensure that your website can be loaded within the localize.live in-context editor.
